Google Analytics Reporting

Google Analytics reporting has some excellent features to really get deep into reporting on your website analytics. We found an excellent report called Users Flow which gives you a great view how your webiste users traverse your site. It shows the page they arrived at called the Starting page and then shows the 1st interaction, 2nd interaction, 3rd interaction etc depending on how far your user browsed the site. It shows session information including drop-offs at each stage and can show you where you need to focus to improve your users engagement.

Google Analytics Users Flow
